title: Game Dev Tycoon: ExpandMod- 4.0.0
description:
Game Dev Tycoon: ExpandMod is the ultimate mod for Game Dev Tycoon. It has all of the features of every Expansion Pack for Game Dev Tycoon in one complete package.

How to Install this Mod:
1. Copy and Paste the files into the Mod Folder for Game Dev Tycoon
2. Launch Game Dev Tycoon
3. Go to the Pause Menu
4. Click the Mods Button
5. Activate the Mod
6. Restart the Game
7. Start a New Save Game

Mod is only Compatible with: Game Dev Tycoon 1.4.5-1.4.15 on Steam


Requirements: GDT Mod Api and UltimateLib Mod API

You can get UltimateLib from https://github.com/abesco/gamedevtycoon-mods-ultimatelib
